CheckTitle: Check if SES identities (domains or email addresses) have public policies
CheckType: Software and Configuration Checks/AWS Security Best Practices
Description: Check if SES identities (domains or email addresses) have public resource policies.
Risk: Publicly accessible SES identities can allow unauthorized email sending or receiving, leading to potential abuse or phishing attacks.

Recommendation.Text: Review and restrict SES identity policies to prevent public access. Ensure policies follow the Principle of Least Privilege.
